nucleus.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the central part of an atom, made up of neutrons, protons, and other elementary particles
nucleus.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the central part of almost all the cells of living things
nucleus.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a small important group at the centre of a larger group or organization
nucleus.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: the nucleus of an effective team
Marantz and Grohl form the nucleus of the Atlanta operation.
